name: VLOOKUP
description: The VLOOKUP function searches for a value in the leftmost column of a table, and returns a value in the same row from another column in the table.

inputs.lookup_value: Enter the value to look up
inputs.table_array: Select the table/range to look up in
inputs.col_index_num: Select the column to return the value from

name: SUM
description: The SUM function adds all the values in a range of cells.

inputs.range: Select the range of cells to sum

name: AVERAGE
description: The AVERAGE function calculates the arithmetic mean (average) of a range of cells.

inputs.range: Select the range of cells to calculate the average for

name: STDEV.P
description: The STDEV.P function calculates the standard deviation of a population based on the entire population.

inputs.range: Select the range of cells to calculate the standard deviation for

name: STDEV.S
description: The STDEV.S function calculates the standard deviation of a sample based on a sample population.

inputs.range: Select the range of cells to calculate the standard deviation for

name: VAR.P
description: The VAR.P function calculates the variance of a population based on the entire population.

inputs.range: Select the range of cells to calculate the variance for

name: VAR.S
description: The VAR.S function calculates the variance of a sample based on a sample population.

inputs.range: Select the range of cells to calculate the variance for

name: MODE.SNGL
description: The MODE.SNGL function returns the most frequently occurring value in a range of cells.

inputs.range: Select the range of cells to calculate the mode for

name: IF
description: The IF function checks whether a condition is met and returns one value if it is true, and another value if it is false.

inputs.value_if_true: Enter the value to return if the condition is true
inputs.value_if_false: Enter the value to return if the condition is false

name: COUNTIF
description: The COUNTIF function counts the number of cells in a range that meet a specified criteria.

inputs.range: Select the range of cells to count
inputs.criteria: Enter the criteria to count for

name: SUMIF
description: The SUMIF function sums the values in a range of cells that meet a specified criteria.

inputs.range: Select the range of cells to evaluate the criteria against
inputs.criteria: Enter the criteria to sum for
inputs.sum_range: Select the range of cells to sum (or leave blank to sum the same range as the criteria range)
